      Constructor Description
      ActionGameState​(Board<P> board, S lightPlayer, S darkPlayer, Player turn)
      Instantiates a game state that represents an action that was taken.
      MovedGameState​(Board<P> board, S lightPlayer, S darkPlayer, Player turn, R roll, Move<P> move)
      Instantiates a game state representing a move that was made in a game.
      OngoingGameState​(GameStateType type, Board<P> board, S lightPlayer, S darkPlayer, Player turn)
      Instantiates a game state that is included while the game is still ongoing.
      PlayableGameState​(GameStateType type, Board<P> board, S lightPlayer, S darkPlayer, Player turn)
      Instantiates a game state where the game is waiting for an interaction from a player to continue the game.
      RolledGameState​(Board<P> board, S lightPlayer, S darkPlayer, Player turn, R roll)
      Instantiates a game state that represents a roll that was made in a game.
      WaitingForMoveGameState​(Board<P> board, S lightPlayer, S darkPlayer, Player turn, R roll)
      Instantiates a game state where the game is waiting for a player to make a move.
      WaitingForRollGameState​(Board<P> board, S lightPlayer, S darkPlayer, Player turn)
      Instantiates a game state where the game is waiting for a player to roll the dice.
      WinGameState​(Board<P> board, S lightPlayer, S darkPlayer, Player winner)
      Instantiates a game state where a player has won the game.
